author: George H. John and Ron Kohavi and Karl Pfleger
title: Irrelevant Features and the Subset Selection Problem
window: The C4.5 program is the program that comes with Quinlan's book (Quinlan 1992); the ID3 results were obtained by running C4.5 and using the unpruned trees. On the artificial datasets, we used the ``-s -m1'' C4.5 flags which indicate that subset splits may be used and that splitting should continue until purity. To estimate the accuracy for feature subsets, we used 25-fold
